title: Enhancing Clinical Practice Competencies: Collaborative Learning-Based Instructional Design for Vocational School Chemistry Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze chemistry-related problems occurring in occupational settings and propose solutions through collaborative learning.
Learners demonstrate the ability to connect chemistry concepts to real-world work scenarios in discussion-based lessons.
Learners can record and share chemical experiment data and results using smartphone-based tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
